thread.title: Vonlane luxury commuter bus to launch Austin-Houston service
thread.title_full: Vonlane luxury commuter bus to launch Austin-Houston service

author: Michael Theis
title: Vonlane luxury commuter bus to launch Austin-Houston service
text:
Vonlane Each of the Vonlane motor coaches cost $700,000. Vonlane will expand its luxury commuter bus lines to add service between Austin and Houston beginning in January, reports the Austin American-Statesman . According to the report, Vonlane has purchased three new buses for $2.25 million to handle the additional service. The company, which uses buses with just 16 plush seats, onboard Wi-Fi Internet access, and a six-seat conference room for meetings on the go, currently only ferries passengers on routes between Dallas and Austin as well as Dallas and Houston. A one-way ticket costs about $100. The company is also launching special sports game buses to bring out-of-town fans to professional and college football games in the three cities. ABJ reporter Jan Buchholz recently took a trip on the Vonlane bus from Austin to Dallas. Here's what she found out.
